question: What is AOT compilation in Angular?

options.A: AOT compilation is the process of compiling Angular templates during the build process instead of at runtime.
options.B: AOT compilation is the process of compiling Angular templates at runtime instead of during the build process.
options.C: AOT compilation is the process of compiling Angular templates during the testing process instead of at runtime.
options.D: AOT compilation is the process of compiling Angular templates during the deployment process instead of at runtime.

question: What are the benefits of AOT compilation?

options.A: Faster rendering, Smaller bundle size, Earlier error detection, Better security, Reduced server load
options.B: Slower rendering, Larger bundle size, Later error detection, Worse security, Increased server load
options.C: Faster rendering, Larger bundle size, Earlier error detection, Better security, Reduced server load
options.D: Slower rendering, Smaller bundle size, Later error detection, Worse security, Increased server load

question: How does AOT differ from JIT compilation?

options.A: AOT compilation happens during the build process, while JIT compilation happens at runtime.
options.B: AOT compilation happens at runtime, while JIT compilation happens during the build process.
options.C: AOT compilation happens during the testing process, while JIT compilation happens at runtime.
options.D: AOT compilation happens during the deployment process, while JIT compilation happens at runtime.
